name: Strawberry Blue
description: Strawberry Blue is a 75% sativa bred by World of Seeds that crosses Strawberry and New Blue Line. These lanky buds are favored for their notable sweet, fruity aroma and provide heady effects true to its sativa heritage. Indoor or outdoor grows offer comparable yields, with a flowering time of around 9 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Strawberry Blue is a 75% sativa bred by World of Seeds that crosses Strawberry and New Blue Line. These lanky buds are favored for their notable sweet, fruity aroma and provide heady effects true to its sativa heritage. Indoor or outdoor grows offer comparable yields, with a flowering time of around 9 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text:
Smoke:
We smoked it from a joint which was small and tightly wrapped. We didn't even need that much. Probably about .2 between 3 people was definitely enough. Shortly after we lit up we were squinting our eyes and laughing at jokes. I would recommend this for a day time smoke and definitely for an active schedule. Its definitely not tiring and am able to go about my daily business. 

Taste:
The taste is very sweet as you can imagine a strawberry would be and is very sweet tasting through a bong as well. 

Look:
These buds are very green with extremely orange hairs. The hairs are thick and all over. Tons of crystals lining the entirety of the leaves. Leaves are also very well grown and preserved within the denseness of them.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Strawberry Blue, Blackberry Haze, Sugar Punch, Pineapple Skunk, and Hardcore OG
articles.author: Anna Wilcox
articles.text:
Summer may be over, but that doesn't mean an end to fun and fruity summertime flavors. This week's strain alert is packed with some extra tasty treats. From Strawberry Blue to Sugar Punch, these gems all feature incredibly unique and full-bodied aromas, perfect for sneaking in one last taste of those fresh summer flavors. 
Visit the Leafly strain Explorer to write a review or find one of these delicious buds near you!
1. Strawberry Blue
Characteristics of Strawberry Blue:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Strawberry and New Blue
Bred by World of Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Delivers head-heavy, cerebral effects
Indoor and outdoor flowering time of 9 weeks

2. Blackberry Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Bred by Nebu Hybridz
Sweet, berry aroma with hints of violet, spice, and cocoa
Brings focused and energetic effects

3. Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Slightly sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross of Super Silver Haze and The One
Bred by Sannie Seeds
Berry and lemon aroma
Has dreamy, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 9-10 weeks

4. Pineapple Skunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Skunk:

Hybrid with slightly indica-dominant effects
Cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese
Bred by Humboldt Seeds
Sweet, pineapple aroma
Delivers mellow, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks 

5. Hardcore OG
Characteristics of Hardcore OG: 

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry
California-based genetics
Pungent aroma
Brings soothing, sedative effects
High THC

growInfo.growNotes:
Indoor grows yield between 350 and 450 grams per square meter
	Outdoor grows yield between 350 and 500 grams per square meter
